full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,DPAL MGON DON LNGA'I GSER SKYEMS 'BUL TSUL LEGS TSOGS LHUN GRUB ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @004A *, ,(ZHES DPAL MGON DON LNGA'I GSER SKYEMS 'BUL TSUL LEGS TSOGS LHUN GRUB ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI RTZOD PA'I DUS KYI THA MA'I RANG CAG SEMS CAN RNAMS LA MI DANG MI MIN RNAMS KYI GNOD PA CHAR LTAR 'BAB PA'I DUS 'DI LA RANG GZHAN KUN LA PHAN PA DANG, KHYAD PAR RIGS DANG RUS SHING TU MTHO SHING PHUN SUM TSOGS PA DAD PA DANG DAM TSIG GTZANG MA RNAM DPYOD YANGS PA THU SHI YI GUNG KHUNG TI LING TUR GI TSE RIN CHEN RDO RJE'I DON GRUB ,SH'AKYA'I DGE SLONG DZNYA NA MING CAN SKYIS BRIS PA'O, ,BSTAN 'GRO YONGS LA PHAN 'DOGS PAR GYUR CIG , ,,BKRA SHIS PAR GYUR CIG , ,,)
